module.name: part_and_version_identification
module.purpose: The Part and version identification application module supports the requirement to identify and version parts.

inscope.li: the identification of parts which includes a unique identifying label or number, an organization or person in organziation which assigned the label or number;
the identification of versions for parts (which can be null);
the identification of organizations or persons in organziations which supply the part under the given label or number;
a data structure for specifying part categories;

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concept of part identification.

uof.name: Part_And_Version_Identification
uof.description: The Part_And_Version_Identification UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of the identification of a part and a version.

aa.refpath: product_definition_formation <- (applied_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_organization_assignment {applied_organization_assignment.role-> organization_role organization_role.name='part supplier'}) (applied_person_and_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_person_and_organization_assignment {applied_person_and_organization_assignment.role-> person_and_organization_role person_and_organization_role.name='part supplier'})
